import React, { Component } from 'react'; class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { facultyname: 'facultyname', fid: 0 }; } initial = () => { let value = this; sessionStorage.setItem('fid', 400); sessionStorage.setItem('fname', 'Aghilan'); value.setState({ facultyname: sessionStorage.getItem('fname') }); value.setState({ fid: sessionStorage.getItem('fid') }); }; render() { return (
